FuncDef: The display radius-server accounting-stop-packet command displays information about Accounting Stop packets on the RADIUS server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a RADIUS server template.
The name is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

Specifies an IP address, in the dotted decimal format.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When checking configurations or troubleshooting RADIUS, you can run the display radius-server accounting-stop-packet command to view information about Accounting Stop packets on the RADIUS server.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
